Name: HUNTERS FOR YOUR BRAIN
About the game: In the laboratory where experiments were conducted on humans, a disaster occurred. Almost all employees left the clinic except you. You have to go through the corridors filled with crowds of zombies. The clinic itself is located on the territory of the secret military base, and a cleaning team has already been sent to you, their order is not to leave the living! You have to go through military cordons and offensive groups on the way to the exit. Look for ammunition and medicine to survive. Ready? Then go ahead. Game Features: -good graphics; -simple management; - interesting gameplay; - light music; - an unforgettable adventure;
